name: thymeleaf-layout-dialect
description: A dialect for Thymeleaf that lets you build layouts and reusable templates in order to improve code reuse
author: Emanuel Rabina <emanuelrabina@gmail.com> (http://www.ultraq.net.nz/)

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:init && gitbook build && gradle clean groovydoc && cp -r build/docs/groovydoc/ _book/groovydoc/
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:ultraq/thymeleaf-layout-dialect gh-pages --force
